bio: Claire Thompson is the co-founder and CEO of SaaSOptics, a rapidly growing provider of subscription management and billing automation software for SaaS companies. A veteran entrepreneur, Claire has over 15 years of experience in the cloud computing space. Prior to founding SaaSOptics in 2018, she was the VP of Marketing at SaaSMetrics, where she helped drive adoption of their usage analytics platform. Claire's strategic vision and product leadership have been key factors in SaaSOptics' success, allowing the company to triple its customer base and headcount in just three years. She holds an MBA from Harvard Business School.
